SafePi: A Crypto Wallet
You Can Trust

Trade, store and use all your cryptocurrencies with ease of mind.
Fully Open Source, Fully Customizable.

Contact Us
  • How to Buy
  • White Paper

SafePi: Anytime, Anywhere

Use your cryptocurency from any computer or smartphone, without worrying!

Straight from your browser

Thanks to its advanced cryptographic protocol you can safely use SafePi from any browser or smartphone. No more complicated interfaces!

Most Advanced Crypto Wallet

A 64 bit quad core CPU and its Linux OS, makes SafePi the most advanced crypto wallet in the world

Use your crypto!

Send, receive, buy and store your cryptocurrencies, without complications or worries!

Fully Open Source!

Can you trust a wallet you don't understand? We can't! And that's why SafePi is fully open source, hardware and software.

How SafePi Works?

SafePi is a multilayerd cryptographic hardware token, powered by the Linux Operating System

Advanced Cryptographic protocol

SafePi sign and verify everything

Web of Trust

Blockchain as DPKI

Encrypted Storage

The most advanced crypto protocol for your storage

All-In-One Crypto Wallet

Why settle for less? SafePi can store all your secrets in one place.

Find all the supported features
